title: 34 Stateside strikes ! Every goal from our US Tours
body_text:
For the fifth time since 2016, our men's first team are heading to the USA for pre-season action, and to get you hyped why not watch all our previous goals from those past tours?
There have been 34 scored across the nation in that time, including some stunning strikes you might have forgotten from then-hot prospects Bukayo Saka, Eddie Nketiah and Gabriel Martinelli, former stars such as Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain and Alexandre Lacazette, and current heroes including Martin Odegaard, Leandro Trossard and Kai Havertz.
You can also see how we fared against opposition such as Bayern Munich and Real Madrid, and indeed the MLS All-Stars who we've tackled on two separate occasions, plus relive our last visit to SoFi Stadium when we put five past Barcelona last summer, including a wondergoal from Fabio Vieira.
Press play on the video above to see them all again, and don't forget you can see how this summer's tour unfolds against Bournemouth, Manchester United and Liverpool by purchasing Match Passes to see all the action live, or if you're in the US tickets are still available.
